Package CS509.client.dao

Class ServerInterface

java.lang.Object
CS509.client.dao.ServerInterface
public class ServerInterface extends Object
This class provides an interface to the CS509 server. It provides sample methods to perform HTTP GET and HTTP POSTS
Since:
2016-02-24
Version:
1.1
Author:
blake

  • Method Details

    • getAirports

      public String getAirports(String team)
      Return an XML list of all the airports Retrieve the list of airports available to the specified ticketAgency via HTTPGet of the server
      Parameters:
      team - identifies the ticket agency requesting the information
      Returns:
      xml string listing all airports

    • getAirplanes

      public String getAirplanes(String team)
      Return an XML list of all the airplanes Retrieve the list of airports available to the specified ticketAgency via HTTPGet of the server
      Parameters:
      team - identifies the ticket agency requesting the information
      Returns:
      xml string listing all airplanes

    • lock

      public static boolean lock(String team)
      Lock the database for updating by the specified team. The operation will fail if the lock is held by another team.
      Parameters:
      team - is the name of team requesting server lock
      Returns:
      true if the server was locked successfully, else false

    • unlock

      public static boolean unlock(String team)
      Unlock the database previous locked by specified team. The operation will succeed if the server lock is held by the specified team or if the server is not currently locked. If the lock is held be another team, the operation will fail. The server interface to unlock the server interface uses HTTP POST protocol
      Parameters:
      team - is the name of the team holding the lock
      Returns:
      true if the server was successfully unlocked.

    • buyTickets

      public static boolean buyTickets(String team, String xmlReservation)
      Reserve seat using flight number and seat type
      Parameters:
      team -
      xmlReservation - is the xml containing user defined flight number and seat type
      Returns:
      true if SUCCESS code returned from server
